page.title: 06Population
page.content: {Yaxley}has a population of about six thousand and obviously an enormous number of these were born outside the village.In our survey we took a cross section of the village,so that we interviewed people from several different estates built over the past 20 years as well as the older parts of the village like Broadway and Chapel St. and of course Main St. which has houses going back to the 17th century. we also tried to get some of the small fen farmers into our survey. We found that a little more than half of the people interviewed were not born in the village but had moved into it from over areas for a variety of reasons e.g.convenience for work in Peterborough,the A1 is only a mile from the village,also houses are comparatively cheap.
